title: The Language of film: the technique of super 8 production
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion pictures - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Editing

description: Follows a group of 12-16 year old student filmmakers through the various stages of creating their own 8mm film. Looks at three major areas: pre-production (scriptwriting, props and equipment); production (camera shots, direction, actors, assistants); and post-production (editing, sound). Narrated by Linda Schuyler. Suitable for secondary level.
